output.analysis:
Let me analyze this post according to the given criteria:
1. Has CMF: No CMF number is present, but this isn't decisive on its own.
2. Refers to candidate: Yes, explicitly mentions "Elena Lasconi" who is a presidential candidate (Position #1 on the ballot).
3. Addresses wide population: Yes, this is a paid advertisement on Facebook/Instagram with significant reach (25,000-30,000 impressions) and high spend (300-399 RON).
4. Electoral objective: Yes, the message "elena lasconi nu are facultate" (Elena Lasconi doesn't have a college degree) appears to be an attempt to discredit the candidate by highlighting a perceived negative aspect about her education. This is clearly meant to influence voters' perception.
5. Journalism: No, this doesn't meet journalistic standards. It's a short, unsupported statement without context or balanced reporting.
6. Personal opinion: No, this is not presented as a personal opinion but rather as a factual statement, distributed through paid advertising.
This appears to be negative electoral propaganda because: - It directly targets a presidential candidate - It's distributed widely through paid channels - It's clearly meant to influence voters negatively - It's running after the campaign period has ended - It lacks journalistic value or educational purpose

conclusion.electoral-propaganda-analysis: This post constitutes electoral propaganda because it meets all criteria under Article 36(7): a) Directly references a presidential candidate b) Is being used during election period c) Has clear electoral objective to influence voters negatively d) Exceeds journalistic informative purposes
conclusion.message-for-police: 5news.RO, pentru incalcarea articolului 55 t) din Legea 370/2004, prin distribuirea de continut electoral negativ impotriva candidatei Elena Lasconi dupa incheierea perioadei de campanie electorala, la data de 23.11.2024. Postarea platita pe Facebook cu ID-ul 564170259552157 contine mesajul "elena lasconi nu are facultate", reprezentand propaganda electorala negativa care urmareste influentarea votantilor prin discreditarea candidatului. Mesajul a fost distribuit ca reclama platita pe Facebook si Instagram, cu un buget semnificativ intre 300-399 RON si o audienta estimata intre 25.000-30.000 de persoane, demonstrand intentia clara de a influenta un numar mare de alegatori dupa perioada legala permisa pentru propaganda electorala.
